Package j2k

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ImageWindow
    The interface ImageWindow must be implemented by all windows that contain a ImagePanel object.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Cache
    Cache extends KDU_cache and ties JpipConstants to the cache object
    ChunkedInputStream
    The class ChunkedInputStream allows to decode HTTP chunked responses with a simple format.
    Enviroment
    Multi-thread Environment This class sets up the multi-threaded environment required by Kakadu
    HTTPMessage  
    HTTPRequest  
    HTTPResponse  
    HTTPSocket  
    ImageInput
    This class handles the image input and control of the reader and decompressor
    ImageLayer
    ImageLayer This class creates an Image Layer with a pixel recolouring, however this may be no longer used as there is problems in re-displaying the new image after recolouring that have not yet been resolved
    ImageOutput
    Outputs an Image to a standard image format
    ImagePanel
    This class defines the JPanel on which an image is stored, as well as event functions such as the click and drag movement and zooming.
    ImageView
    This class creates the ImageView for an image, this includes creating the region of interest.
    JpipConstants
    The class JpipConstants is used to define several JPIP global constants.
    JpipDataInputStream
    The class JpipDataInputStream allows to read JPIP data-bin segments, as it is defined in the Part 9 of the the JPEG2000 standard.
    JpipDataSegment
    The class JpipDataSegment is used to construct objects to store segments of JPIP data.
    Mutex
    Mutex for locking and unlocking the codestream thread
    OpenImage
    This class ties together all the required classes and functions required to open an image and return the created ImagePanel ready to be used in the GUI
    Reader
    The Reader is responsible for managing the JPIP communications over HTTP.
    Render
    The Render class is responsible for rendering all the JPIP data into a BufferedImage format.
    StringInputStream
